content: Firestop box insert Intumescent box insert designed to help protect electrical outlet boxes from fire and smoke ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Firestop putties ### FEATURES:Features Three sizes designed to fit common outlet box applications Quick and simple to install â€“ just stick it to the inside of the outlet box Ideal for renovation projects, where only the interior of box is accessible Reusable and removable Mold and mildew resistant Applications An intumescent box insert designed to help protect electrical outlet boxes in case of fire Standardized sizing for common outlet box sizes For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 3416772 - Firestop box insert 2 x 4 50 pk - Package Size 50 pc - 3417183 - Firestop box insert 4 x 4 50 pk - Package Size 50 pc - 3417184 - Firestop box insert 4-11/16 x 4-11/16 50 pk - Package Size 50 pc
